short_summary: Transport Canada, Marine Safety and Security is seeking the services of a Human Resource Assistant Consultant to support the work being undertaken in the Seafarer Certification Group.
description: Transport Canada, Marine Safety and Security is seeking the services of a Human Resource Assistant Consultant to support the work being undertaken in the Seafarer Certification Group. The current resourcing levels do not allow for the Seafarer Certification Group to effectively action the HR files in an effective and timely manner to successfully meet our intended goals. A Human Resources Assistant Consultant is required to assist and support the Seafarer Certification Group with the various human resources documentation required to process staffing requests in a timely manner. The goal is to issue a one (1) year contract including two (2) option years with a maximum level of effort of 138 days per year
